name: @aja/core
description: Aja is the ultimate Discord bot for server administration; with its cutting-edge auto-moderation abilities, Aja can easily identify and eliminate spam, offensive messages, and other unwanted content, keeping your server clean and safe. But that's not all, Aja also has top-notch security features that will protect your server from raids and other malicious activities, while also providing detailed logs and reports for your convenience. But, Aja isn't just a moderation and security bot, it also comes with a variety of powerful administration tools, like, custom commands, a leveling system, and personalized welcome messages, that make managing your server a breeze, Aja can entertain your community with ease. Say goodbye to spam, raids, and other unwanted activities and hello to a smooth, enjoyable experience for your community with Aja. Try it now and see the difference it makes!
